definitions: without guilt for a crime or offense

examples.text: the lawyer says that his client was acting innocently

shortDefinitions: without guilt for crime or offence

definitions: without responsibility for or direct involvement in an event yet suffering its consequences

examples.text: he was shot at through a window while innocently walking past the house

shortDefinitions: in way that is not responsible for or directly involved in event yet suffers its consequences

definitions: in a manner that is uncorrupted or free from moral wrong

examples.text: a charming tale with children innocently singing the chorus

shortDefinitions: in manner that is uncorrupted or free from moral wrong

definitions: in a simple or naive manner

examples.text: many people innocently believe that they're safe from credit card fraud

definitions: with no intention of causing harm or offense

examples.text: my cab driver innocently asked me what I did for a living

shortDefinitions: with no intention of causing harm or offence
